tool.name: PANGOLIN
tool.description: Phylogenetic Assignment of Named Global Outbreak LINeages

param.name: query
param.label: Query fasta file of sequences to analyse

param.name: minlength
param.label: Minimum query length allowed for pangolin to attempt assignment

param.name: maxambig
param.label: Maximum proportion of Ns allowed for pangolin to attempt assignment

tool.help:
**PANGOLIN** stands for "Phylogenetic Assignment of Named Global Outbreak LINeages".
pangolin runs a multinomial logistic regression model trained against lineage assignments based on GISAID data.
